SBRS 2014

McCaw Hall, Frances C. Arrillaga Alumni Center (326 Galvez Street, Stanford)

Friday October 17, 2014

9:00AM - 5:00PM

The 2014 Stanford-Berkeley Robotics Symposium has concluded - thanks to everyone who attended for making the event such a resounding success! A YouTube playlist of the SBRS 2014 talks may be found here; for more details see the event schedule.
The second Stanford-Berkeley Robotics Symposium brings together roboticists from Stanford, Berkeley, and the Bay Area robotics industry. Registration is free, but mandatory for each symposium attendee: SBRS 2014 Eventbrite.
The program will feature:
  • Presentations from Stanford and Berkeley faculty
  • Talks from bay area industry representatives
  • Keynote talks from Prof. Boyd (Stanford) and Prof. Jordan (Berkeley)
  • Student poster session
See the SBRS 2013 website for highlights from the first Stanford-Berkeley Robotics Symposium.
Organizers: Marco Pavone (Stanford) and Pieter Abbeel (UC Berkeley)
Local arrangements: Marco Pavone and Edward Schmerling (Stanford)
